scripts.postinstall: npm run install:enrich && npm run install:fakeUnpaywall && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:graphql && npm run install:update
scripts.test:enrich: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0; cd src/enrich && npm run test
scripts.test:graphql: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0; cd src/graphql && npm run test
scripts.test:update: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0; cd src/update && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test:update; npm run test:graphql; npm run test:enrich
